name: Gangster Outlaws
description:
Play as gangster outlaws in the neighborhood, fighting criminal mafia when a turf war erupts between the gangs of the city for a hostile takeover of the neighborhood. Tatiana the mob enforcer and a prophecy for the city in need fights with the criminal elite rival gangsters and plans to save the endangered city with the help of her boss connections and unique modern fighting skills. Gangster Outlaws is the ultimate virtual mafia combat fighting game where the thirst for rival gangster fights between the thugs in the midst of criminal town is fulfilled with great user experience and exciting new features of 2018, which were never introduced before. Fight and kill enemies with hand-to-hand combat, use heavy weapons at disposals like a deadly bat in hand or military grade throwing knife for a deadly killer.
Your mission starts as some evil criminal forces trying to take over and control the neighborhood for some illegal mafia drug cartel and terrorizing the city but you being born and raised in this locality has a great responsibility to serve the citizens of the hood and save them from any wrath drawn by outside forces. Play your role as a necessary gangster to overrule the establishing reign and fight with rival gang mobs and ex-cons, with your brutal hand combos, bat smashing and throwing deadly knife skills. Drive around the mesmerizing city in search of action with help of informers & your godfather the mentor who trained you for such hard time survival in grim phase.
Download now to get the real feel as a true outlaw criminal gangster fighter hero in this online virtual fight survival game of 2018. This is a thrilling combat game that will let you enhance your undercover mission tactics & Gangster fighting skills. Be a part of stealth hero mission gang prove that you’re the best underworld criminal, gangster & Mafioso.

Gangster Outlaws Key Features:
- Unique combos and fighting styles.
- Different 3D stages with stunning views.
- Power-ups to perform the deadly combination.
- Special attacks with joystick controls.
- Play anytime, anywhere with all new 3D
- Intuitive touch controls, and action-packed game-play.
- Exclusive driving experience of the ​vintage vehicle.
